Spec

  • Inverted Index Suite
    • Class Inverted Index
      • should be a class
    • Get Tokens String
      • should be available in class InvertedIndex
      • should return an array containing alphabets only
      • should return an array containing the correct number of words
    • Read Book Data
      • should have createIndex available in class InvertedIndex
      • should ensure the JSON file is not empty
    • Distinct Words
      • should be present in class InvertedIndex
      • should return an array of words without duplicates
    • Populate Index
      • should have an Index created
      • should accurately map words to their document location
    • Get Index
      • should return an accurate index Object of the indexed file
    • Search Index
      • should have searchIndex method accessible in the class
      • should return correct index document for each word
